Hi !

I would like to extract links from pages like this: (xml-files)
http://podcast.dr.dk/p1/rssfeed/samfundstanker.xml

They are pretty straight foreward - but the only exctrator that will 
grab these are the ExtractorUniversal.

That Extractor seems to not like '_' in URI's ??

that means that URI's like:
Http://podcast.dr.dk/P1/SAMFUNDSTANKER/2005/SAMF_050925.mp3
gets stripped to:
Http://podcast.dr.dk/P1/SAMFUNDSTANKER/2005/SAMF

any comments / solutions ??

best
